answers.answer: Just want to say hi & someone with more experience will post.   Are you home from hospital now?    There may be more tests & Drs before your surgery. Then you can learn more about what's going on right?  Pamela

question: Hello, I just join this  forum today because I need support and  education . I went to the ER for diabetes complication on March 11, 2014  but the doctor also check my body and after   feeling my  stomach and  ultrasound, she   found  an ovary cyst/mass and 3 fibroid.. The  doctor said it could be  cancer, their is fluid in one of my ovary, total hysterectomy .The doctors was  throwing so many things at me , my mind was  gone after hearing the word  cancer.About me,I'm 44 years old, I have never had any children. I  believe my diabetes   is feeding my cyst and fibroid. I also  still have my  period,no pain. My  stomach does look like I'm pregnant. I do not know what to thing or feel anymore. All I keep thinking is cancer
title: I'm new and  need support
